FORDER, FACTUAL_START_DATE, FACTUAL_END_DATE, FSTAGE, FTASK, FDELIVERY, FSTATE, FPRINCIPLE, FLPARTICIPANT, FSPARTICIPANT, FNOTE, DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_MAIN_ID, FCREATOR, FCTIME, FLASTMODIFY_MAN, FLASTMODIFY_TIME, DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_BACK_ID, FPLAN_START_DATE, FPLAN_END_DATE, FTYPEG, FTYPEY
mapper.update:
update
set FORDER = #{FORDER}, FACTUAL_START_DATE = #{FACTUAL_START_DATE}, FACTUAL_END_DATE = #{FACTUAL_END_DATE}, FSTAGE = #{FSTAGE}, FTASK = #{FTASK}, FDELIVERY = #{FDELIVERY}, FSTATE = #{FSTATE}, FPRINCIPLE = #{FPRINCIPLE}, FLPARTICIPANT = #{FLPARTICIPANT}, FSPARTICIPANT = #{FSPARTICIPANT}, FNOTE = #{FNOTE},
FLASTMODIFY_MAN = #{FLASTMODIFY_MAN}, FLASTMODIFY_TIME = #{FLASTMODIFY_TIME},
FPLAN_START_DATE=#{FPLAN_START_DATE}, FPLAN_END_DATE=#{FPLAN_END_DATE} where DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_BACK_ID = #{DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_BACK_ID}
mapper.select:
select gy.*,isnull(f1.FTEXT,'') FSTATE_TEXT,isnull(f1.FCOLOR,'') FSTATE_COLOR from( select ,f2.PLANINSTANCE_ID, substring(f2.FCTIME,1,10) FDate, (select FCTIME from EPM_DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_MAIN where DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_MAIN_ID=#{DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_MAIN_ID}) FCTIMEA from f ,EPM_DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_MAIN f2 where f.DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_MAIN_ID=f2.DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_MAIN_ID ) gy left join EPM_ICONCOLOR f1 on f1.ICONCOLOR_ID=gy.FSTATE
where 1=1
and PLANINSTANCE_ID=#{PLANINSTANCE_ID} and (FDate BETWEEN DATEADD(wk, DATEDIFF(wk,0,FCTIMEA),-7) and DATEADD(wk, DATEDIFF(wk,0,FCTIMEA), -1) ) and FTYPEY='下周计划'
and DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_MAIN_ID=#{DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_MAIN_ID} and FTYPEY='下周计划'
and DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_MAIN_ID=#{DOUBLE_PLAN_WEEK_MAIN_ID} and FTYPEY='本周总结'
and 1=1
ORDER BY cast(isnull(FORDER,0) as int)
